testcase.classname: User API end to end positive scenarios
testcase.name: Verify that the Admin creates a new User with valid credentials
testcase.system-out: Given Admin creates a request body for the USER API with valid test data....passed When Admin sends a Post request.............................................passed Then Admin receives 201 created status code.................................passed

testcase.classname: User API end to end positive scenarios
testcase.name: Check if Admin able to retrieve all user details with valid endpoint and valid authorization
testcase.system-out: Given Admin creates GET request for the user service API....................passed When Admin sends a Get request..............................................passed Then Admin receives 200 OK Status with response body........................passed

testcase.classname: User API end to end positive scenarios
testcase.name: Check if Admin able to retrieve user details with valid Id
testcase.system-out: Given Admin creates GET request with valid user id..........................passed When Admin sends the Get request with Valid id..............................passed Then Admin receives Status Code 200 OK with Response Body...................passed

testcase.classname: User API end to end positive scenarios
testcase.name: Verify if Admin retrieves user details with valid user first name
testcase.system-out: Given Admin creates Http request with valid user first name.................passed When Admin sends Get request with valid user name...........................passed Then Admin receives 200 OK Status with expected username response body......passed

testcase.classname: User API end to end positive scenarios
testcase.name: Check if Admin able to update user details with valid userId and valid request body
testcase.system-out: Given Admin creates PUT Request for the user service API endpoint with Request Body.passed When Admin sends HTTPS Request with valid endpoint..........................passed Then Admin receives 200 OK status with updated details in response body.....passed

testcase.classname: User API end to end positive scenarios
testcase.name: Admin able to delete a user with valid userId
testcase.system-out: Given Admin sets delete request with endpoint and valid userId..............passed When Admin sends User delete request with id................................passed Then Admin receives 200 OK status after deleting user with userId...........passed
